app.name: Sokoban
app.short_description: A little game where the goal is to push cubes to specific locations.
app.long_description:
WARNING: This game is still in development. And only has 4 levels at the moment. Be aware of the updates!
A little game where the goal is to push cubes to specific locations.
Keys: - Directional arrow -> Move character - Start Button -> Reset level - Select Button -> Switch levels - Home Button -> Exit the application
